import React,{Component,Fragment}from'react';class Navhelper extends Component{constructor(props){super(props);// Sticky header
this.StickyHeader=e=>{const windowSize=window.scrollY;const stickyHeader=windowSize>100;this.setState(prevState=>{return{stickyHeader};});};// Mobile menu

navMethod:false,// Search
searchMethod:false,// Sticky
windowSize:"",stickyHeader:0};// Nav toggle
this.toggleNav=this.toggleNav.bind(this);// Search
this.toggleSearch=this.toggleSearch.bind(this);}// Nav toggle
toggleNav(){this.setState({navMethod:!this.state.navMethod});}// Search toggle
toggleSearch(){this.setState({searchMethod:!this.state.searchMethod});}componentDidMount(){window.addEventListener("scroll",this.StickyHeader);}componentWillUnmount(){window.removeEventListener("scroll",this.StickyHeader);}render(){return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Fragment,null);}}export default Navhelper;
